frontMatter.title: Addresses
frontMatter.description: Follow this pattern to collect mailing or home addresses from users.
frontMatter.intro: Use this pattern when you need to collect a mailing or home address, including military base addresses.

when_to_use.value: **Collecting mailing addresses.** When you need a user's mailing location for correspondence.
**Collecting home addresses.** When you need a user's residential address.
**Collecting military base addresses.** When users may be located at military installations.

design_principles.value: **Validate against USPS data.** Compare entries against postal service databases and warn users of discrepancies.
**Adapt fields by country.** State field converts from text input to select menu for US, Canada, and Mexico.
**Use prefill when available.** Populate from VA.gov profile and notify users with the prefill component.
**Clarify profile updates.** Specify whether changes affect the user's broader VA.gov profile.

examples.title: Mailing address
examples.description: Standard form for collecting a mailing address with street, city, state, and postal code fields.

examples.title: Military base address
examples.description: Form variant including military installation checkbox and APO/FPO options.

examples.title: Address confirmation
examples.description: Alert component warning of unmatched USPS data with correction options.

how_to_build.intro: The address pattern uses a structured workflow for both single and multiple address scenarios.

steps.value: Header identifying address type (mailing or home address).
Contextual information block explaining why the address is needed.
Postal code input with country-specific validation.
For home address: 'Same as mailing address' radio option.

frontMatter.code_usage:
The `addressPattern` is available as a web-component pattern in the VA Forms library.

```jsx
import { addressPattern } from '@department-of-veterans-affairs/platform-forms-system/patterns';
```

See the [vets-website repository](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/vets-website) for implementation details.

content_specs.error_message: Enter a postal code meeting your country's requirements
Select a military post office (APO, FPO, or DPO)

accessibility.value: Follow the addresses section in the VA.gov content style guide for displaying addresses.
Error messages should vary based on country selection and validation type.
Military address abbreviations (AA, AE, AP) require specific validation messaging.
